pageSetting.title: 机构考核指标管理导入

column.name: sdbs
column.annotate: 1-时点 2-月日均 3-季日均 4-年日均 5-月累计 6-季累计 7-年累计 8-月平

column.name: bz
column.annotate: 01-人民币 0A-折合人民币 0B-外币折人民币 0C-外币折美元 FF-非币种

sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgkhzbgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'考核指标名称输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.khzbmc)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgkhzbgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'考核指标名称输入错误，长度不能超过:100!' where f_java_rule_length(t.khzbmc)>100 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgkhzbgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'指标代号输入错误，只能输入:4位整数,0位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.zbdh)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.zbdh,4,0)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgkhzbgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'指标代号输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.zbdh)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgkhzbgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'时段标识输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.sdbs)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgkhzbgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'时段标识输入错误，长度不能超过:1!' where f_java_rule_length(t.sdbs)>1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgkhzbgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'币种输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.bz)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgkhzbgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'币种输入错误，长度不能超过:2!' where f_java_rule_length(t.bz)>2 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgkhzbgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'统计口径输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.tjkj)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgkhzbgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'统计口径输入错误，长度不能超过:1!' where f_java_rule_length(t.tjkj)>1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgkhzbgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'指标排序输入错误，只能输入:3位整数,0位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.zbpx)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.zbpx,3,0)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgkhzbgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'指标排序输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.zbpx)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgkhzbgldr_temp t set error=error||'该考核指标名称已存在!!' where exists ( select 1 from khfa_khzb_jg hy where t.khzbmc=hy.khzbmc) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgkhzbgldr_temp t set error=error||'指标代号不存在!' where not exists ( select 1 from KHDX_ZB zb where cast(t.zbdh as decimal(8,0))=zb.zbdh)
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgkhzbgldr_temp t set error=error||'时段标识不存在!' where not exists ( select 1 from khdx_zbsd sd where cast(t.zbdh as decimal(8,0))=sd.zbdh and t.sdbs=sd.sdbs)
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgkhzbgldr_temp t set error=error||'币种不存在!' where not exists ( select 1 from KHDX_ZBBZ bz where cast(t.zbdh as decimal(8,0))=bz.zbdh and t.bz=bz.bz)

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgkhzbgldr_temp t set error=error||'统计口径不存在!' where not exists ( select 1 from KHDX_ZBTJKJ kj where cast(t.zbdh as decimal(8,0))=kj.zbdh and cast(t.tjkj as decimal(8,0))=kj.tjkj and kj.tjkj<>2)

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgkhzbgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'数据已存在!' where exists(select 1 from KHFA_KHZB_JG tar where 1=1 and t.khzbmc =tar.KHZBMC and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null ))

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgkhzbgldr_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select khzbmc from jgkhzbgldr_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by khzbmc having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.khzbmc=dr.khzbmc) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE jgkhzbgldr_temp ( khzbmc varchar(100) , zbdh varchar(100) , zbmc varchar(100) , sdbs varchar(100) , bz varchar(100) , tjkj varchar(100) , zbpx varchar(100) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from jgkhzbgldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from jgkhzbgldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, khzbmc,zbdh,zbmc,sdbs,bz,tjkj,zbpx,khdxdh,error from jgkhzbgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, khzbmc,zbdh,zbmc,sdbs,bz,tjkj,zbpx,khdxdh,error from jgkhzbgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, khzbmc,zbdh,zbmc,sdbs,bz,tjkj,zbpx,khdxdh,error from jgkhzbgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into KHFA_KHZB_JG(khzbdh,khzbmc,zbdh,sdbs,bz,tjkj,zbpx) select (row_number() over(order by t.zbdh)) +(select coalesce(MAX(khzbdh),0) from KHFA_KHZB_JG) khzbdh, t.KHZBMC, zb.zbdh, t.sdbs, t.bz, t.tjkj, cast(t.ZBPX as decimal(3,0)) from jgkhzbgldr_temp t ,KHDX_ZB zb where cast(t.zbdh as decimal(8,0))=zb.zbdh and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null)
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from KHFA_KHZB_JG tar where exists(select 1 from jgkhzbgldr_temp t where 1=1 and t.khzbmc=tar.KHZBMC and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )
